Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

In certain embodiments, the antibodies or antigen binding fragments described herein bind to EC50 (i.e., half the binding concentration) of the AXL protein at between 1ng/mL and 10 μ g/mL.
In certain embodiments, the antibodies or antigen binding fragments described herein bind to the AXL protein with an EC50 (i.e., an effective concentration of 50%) of 10ng/mL to 10 μ g/mL (as determined using FACS analysis).
